_meanings:
A particle (originally
an imitative sound) expressing

{@--7@} Interrogation. (In
spells and incantations {#huM#} is often
found used with <ab>dat.</ab>; {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} {#oM#} 
{#kavacAyahum#}). ({#huMkf#} means ‘to utter the
sound {%hum%}’, ‘to roar, grunt, bellow,
as in {#anuhuMkf#} ‘to roar in return;’  
{#anuhuMkurute GanaDvaniM na hi gomAyurutAni#} 
{#kesarI#} <ls>Śi. 16. 25.</ls>).

{1} uttering the sound ‘hum’; {#pfzwA#}
{#punaH punaH kAMtA huMkArEreva BAzate#}.

{2} the
grunt of a wild boar.
